name: Gun Shooter (Studio Centauri, kingcrimson1112)
description:
A top down shooter where you hunt monsters. You control a remote control gun to hunt them. Match the color of the bullets with the colors of the monster to kill them.

Controls
  1. Use the arrow keys or WSAD to rotate the player
  2. Use U and O keys to cycle between bullets (Controller: LB and RB)
  3. Use the J, K and L keys to use power ups (Controller: X, Y and B)
  4. Pause with the escape key (Controller: Start)
